issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

projectCategory.description: Titanium and related SDKs used in application development
projectCategory.name: Client

resolution.description: A fix for this issue is checked into the tree and tested.
resolution.name: Fixed

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.description:
Description:
1.Make a new project & select master/detail application template
2.Build & run the application on the BB simulator or device
3.You will see a table view with apples,grapes,oranges etc
4.Tap on any table row

Actual Result:
1.Tapping on table row does not open anything as the eventlistner is not working

Expected results:
1.The eventlistner should work & we should be able to get inside the table row after tapping on it
fields.summary: BlackBerry : Event listeners are not working on BlackBerry
fields.environment:
Environment:
Ti Studio : 3.1.0.201301231719
Ti BB SDK : 3.1.0.v20130131073359
Mac OSX : 10.8.2
win 7 64 bit
Win 8 
BB simulator : 10.0.9.386

comments.body:
Confirmed events are firing and the "detail" window does open.
The label in the detail window isn't visible due to 'auto' not working.
If you change it to absolute height/width it works. The layout issue will
be addressed in another ticket.

Verified the fix on the master/detail window app & KS.The event listeners are working as expected.
Thus closing the issue.

Environment:
Ti Studio : 3.1.0.201302061750
Ti BB SDK : 3.1.0.v20130206165546
Mac OSX : 10.8.2
win 7 64 bit
Win 8 
BB simulator : 10.0.9.386

Updated label.
Closing as fixed.

Event listeners working fine. Check with Master/Detail template app
